H0.text: What innovation was introduced to Britain by Prime Minister William Pitt the Younger in 1798. Income Tax

H1.text: What innovation was introduced to Britain by Prime Minister William Pitt the Younger in 1798. National Debt Reduction Plan

H2.text: What innovation was introduced to Britain by Prime Minister William Pitt the Younger in 1798. Central Bank Reform

H3.text: What innovation was introduced to Britain by Prime Minister William Pitt the Younger in 1798. IRPEF

A4.text: This income tax was introduced into Great Britain by Prime Minister William Pitt the Younger in his budget of December 1798, to pay for weapons and equipment for the French Revolutionary War.
